revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Obstacles_to knowing, are blockers_of vision |Aliases= |Comments=
|Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=موانع دید |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=دانستن، دیدن است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=این مصوبه به منظور ایجاد شفافیت بیشتر در سیستم بانکی مورد تصویب قرار گرفت |Example.Gloss=This resolution to aim creating transparency more in system banking subject_to approval was settled |Example.English translation=This resolution passed with the aim of creating more transparency in the banking system |Example.Comments=The implied metaphor is KNOWING IS SEEING, hence any challenge or circumstance that would prevent one from knowing, in this case the affairs of the banking system, is conceptualized in the realm of seeing, i.e., blocking one's vision. Thus, transparency (clear vision) is what allows one to see/know better }} |Entered by=Aria Fani, |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES IN KNOWING ARE VISUAL OBSTRUCTIONS |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Obstacles_to knowing, are blockers_of vision |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=موانع دید |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=دانستن، دیدن است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=این مصوبه به منظور ایجاد شفافیت بیشتر در سیستم بانکی مورد تصویب قرار گرفت |Example.Gloss=This resolution to aim creating transparency more in system banking subject_to approval settled was |Example.English translation=This resolution passed with the aim of creating more transparency in the banking system |Example.Comments=The implied metaphor is KNOWING IS SEEING, hence any challenge or circumstance that would prevent one from knowing, in this case the affairs of the banking system, is conceptualized in the realm of seeing, i.e., blocking one's vision. Thus, transparency (clear vision) is what allows one to see/know better }} |Entered by=Aria Fani, |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES IN KNOWING ARE VISUAL OBSTRUCTIONS |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=end action, end along-path ast-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت در مسیر راه |Target schema=عمل |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=احمدی نژاد به پایان راه رسیده |Example.Gloss=Ahmadinejad to end path reach.past-imp |Example.English translation=Ahmadinezhad has reached the end (of path |Example.Comments=It is not clear whether this statement implicates that Ahmadinejad is near the end of his presidential term or he is approaching an end to his political career (although not mutually exclusive). In either case, this sentence seems to contain the metaphor. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=شهر بم برخلاف تصور هنوز هم طرحهاي نيمه تمام بسياري دارد، خانه هاي نيمه تمام و پروژه هايي که به پايان راه خود نرسيده اند. |Example.Gloss=City bam contrary to perception still projects half complete many has, homes half complete and projects that to end path themselves have not reached |Example.English translation=The city of Bam, contrary to what is perceived, has many unfinished projects, homes left unfinished and projects that have yet to reach the end of their path |Example.Provenance=http://kerman-online.ir/News.aspx?code=989 }} |Entered by=Sanam and Aria, |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=END OF AN ACTION IS THE END OF A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }} the difference between "enteha" and "Payan

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=institution government device ast-COP |Aliases= |Tags=governance metaphors |Family=حکومت, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=دستگاه |Target schema=حکومت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=آیت‌الله هاشمی شاهرودی گفت : مسوولان عالی‌رتبه کشور مصمم هستند که ***ریشه*** اصلی این قتلها پیدا شده و به محاکمه قضایی و عادلانه برسد و امیدواریم رایس جمهور ***دستگاه*** امنیتی کشور را از رویه‌های ناجوری که }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=متؤسفانه پس از گذشت این مدت ، هیچ خبری درباره اقدامات قوه قضاایه منتشر نشده و معلوم نیست این دستگاه ، تا چه میزان موفق شده است به بررسی پرونده بپردازد . }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=institution government apparatus ast-COP |Aliases= |Tags=governance metaphors |Family=حکومت, |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=دستگاه |Target schema=حکومت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=آیت‌الله هاشمی شاهرودی گفت : مسوولان عالی‌رتبه کشور مصمم هستند که ***ریشه*** اصلی این قتلها پیدا شده و به محاکمه قضایی و عادلانه برسد و امیدواریم رایس جمهور ***دستگاه*** امنیتی کشور را از رویه‌های ناجوری که |Example.Comments=the word for apparatus " dastgah" needs a frame. the closest meaning in English could be apparatus }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=متؤسفانه پس از گذشت این مدت ، هیچ خبری درباره اقدامات قوه قضاایه منتشر نشده و معلوم نیست این دستگاه ، تا چه میزان موفق شده است به بررسی پرونده بپردازد . }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases= |Tags=Program sources |Family=استعاره های فقر |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source schema=پخش شدن یک بیماری مسری |Target schema=گسترش مشکلات اجتماعی |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is both a source and target subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=تغییر وضعیتتغییر مکاناست }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=حداکثری که گره فقر مزمن را از کارگران باز نخواهد کرد |Example.English translation= Maximizing the "Eidy" will not solve the persistant poverty of the workers. |Example.Provenance=lormango.mihanblog.com/post/1782 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=این روزها می توان عوارض فقر را در گوشه کنار ایران مشاهده نمود. |Example.English translation= These days we can see the symptoms of poverty in every nook and .corner in Iran }} |Entered by=Metabot |Last reviewed by=Aria |Status=auto imported }}

revision.comment: صفحه‌ای جدید حاوی «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=bureaucracy is a swamp |Aliases= |Family=طرح بروکراسی, طرح دیوان سالاری, |Source schema=غ...» ایجاد کرد
revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=bureaucracy is a swamp |Aliases= |Family=طرح بروکراسی, طرح دیوان سالاری, |Source schema=غرقه |Target schema=بروکراسی |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=آنها كه قدرت را به صورت متمركز زيبا مي ديدند ، به دولت هاي بزرگ رؤي اعتماد دادند و خود را در بوروكراسي قوانين و مقررات دولتي غرقه ساختند |Example.English translation=Those that viewed centralized power as beautiful, they placed their trust in big governments and drowned themselves in the bureaucracy of laws and regulations.
}} |Entered by=Aria Fani, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=bureaucracy is_a swamp |Aliases= |Family=طرح بروکراسی, طرح دیوان سالاری, |Source schema=غرقه |Target schema=بروکراسی |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=آنها كه قدرت را به صورت متمركز زيبا مي ديدند ، به دولت هاي بزرگ رؤي اعتماد دادند و خود را در بوروكراسي قوانين و مقررات دولتي غرقه ساختند |Example.Gloss=Those that power in the form centralized beautiful saw, to governments big turned trust gave, and themselves in bureaucracy of laws and regulations drowned made |Example.English translation=Those that viewed centralized power as beautiful, they placed their trust in big governments and drowned themselves in the bureaucracy of laws and regulations. }} |Entered by=Aria Fani, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=nation building ast-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=شما نگاه کنید به این کشورهای منطقهٔ ما و بسیاری از کشورهای دیگر دنیا ، ببینید آن کشوری که پایه‌های مردمی بودنش به این استحکامی است که امروز در ایران اسلامی مشاهده می‌کنید... |Example.English translation=Among the countries of our region and many other countries in the world, where are those whose foundations are as strong as those in Islamic Iran... |Example.Provenance=Bijankhan }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |LinkEnglish=GOVERNMENT INSTITUTION IS A BUILDING |Investigated for=Persian }}

page.title: Metaphor:مشکلات زندگی، موانع بر سر راه هستند

revision.comment: صفحه‌ای جدید حاوی «{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties life, barrier on head road be.cop-pl |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex...» ایجاد کرد
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties life, barrier on head road be.cop-pl |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=موانع بر سر راه |Target schema=مشکلات زندگی |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES IN PROGRESSING THROUGH LIFE ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }} I have not included "the progress" part from English metaphor to Farsi metaphor

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties life, barrier on head road be.cop-pl |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=موانع بر سر راه |Target schema=مشکلات زندگی |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=زندگی سفر است }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is related to |Related metaphor.Name=در شرایط بودن، در مکان بودن است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=با هر بدبختی بود بیماری را پشت سر گذاشتم
|Example.Gloss=with every "badbakhti" be.past.3sg sickness ra.objmakre back head put.past-1sg |Example.English translation=Despite all the worst conditions I overcame the illness |Example.Provenance=Behrang e.g from a wiki page |Example.Comments= "poshte sar gozashtan" has a frame of succesfully passing through a problem by encountering it }} |Entered by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES IN PROGRESSING THROUGH LIFE ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }} This is a different metaphor than English metaphor DIFFICULTIES IN PROGRESSING THROUGH LIFE ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION ALONG A PATH as it does not necessarily imply making progress but as the example shows it can be just a return to normal condition ( primary location ) POSHTE SAR GOZASHTAN = back head put.infin is not about putting an object behind head. It is about the person's directional view. AS the person moves along the path by changing from illness state to the healthiness , Every thing in the previous location remains in the same location and is viewed as if it is in back of the person's head. PUT has a different frame than GOZASHTAN. It can also mean to let something be or remain in the same lozation. BOGZAR HAMINJA BASHAD: Put.Optative mood here be.preset.Imperative The translation would be Let's it be there or let the object that is previously there stay in the same place(don't move it)

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=difficulties life, barrier on head road be.cop-pl |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=موانع_بر_ سر_راه |Target schema=مشکلات_زندگی |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is an entailment of |Related metaphor.Name=زندگی سفر است }}{{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is related to |Related metaphor.Name=در شرایط بودن، در مکان بودن است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=با هر بدبختی بود بیماری را پشت سر گذاشتم |Example.Gloss=with every "badbakhti" be.past.3sg sickness ra.objmakre back head put.past-1sg |Example.English translation=Despite all the worst conditions I overcame the illness |Example.Provenance=Behrang e.g from a wiki page |Example.Comments="poshte sar gozashtan" has a frame of succesfully passing through a problem by encountering it }} |Entered by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DIFFICULTIES IN PROGRESSING THROUGH LIFE ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }} This is a different metaphor than English metaphor DIFFICULTIES IN PROGRESSING THROUGH LIFE ARE IMPEDIMENTS TO MOTION ALONG A PATH as it does not necessarily imply making progress but as the example shows it can be just a return to normal condition ( primary location ) POSHTE SAR GOZASHTAN = back head put.infin is not about putting an object behind head. It is about the person's directional view. AS the person moves along the path by changing from illness state to the healthiness , Every thing in the previous location remains in the same location and is viewed as if it is in back of the person's head. PUT has a different frame than GOZASHTAN. It can also mean to let something be or remain in the same lozation. BOGZAR HAMINJA BASHAD: Put.Optative mood here be.preset.Imperative The translation would be Let's it be there or let the object that is previously there stay in the same place(don't move it)

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Poverty monster is |Aliases= |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=هیولا |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=فقر ، اعجوبه ایست که بشکه های نفت در عربستان را تا ته سر می کشد. |Example.Gloss=Poverty, wondrous_creature is that barrels_of oil in Saudi_Arabia ra till bottom pumps up |Example.English translation=Poverty is a wondrous creature that pumps up barrels of oil in Saudi Arabia |Example.Comments=The key verb that inscribes the metaphor is 'sar kashidan' which is used in the context of drinking a liquid till the last drop, characterizing poverty as human-like
But the broader question is: does 'wondrous creature' necessarily equate a 'hayual' or a monster? Should be discussed }} |Entered by=Reza |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=POVERTY IS A FIERCE CREATURE |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=LESS DOWN AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=افقی |Target schema=کمیّت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سقوط قيمت جهاني طلا و بي‌تفاوتي بازار ايران! |Example.Gloss=Fall price world gold and indifference bazaar Iran. |Example.English translation=The international price of gold drops and indifference in the Iranian market }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=تبش پايين آمده بود و رنگ رويش بازشده بود |Example.Gloss=Fever down came had and color face-3rd open was. |Example.English translation=His fever came down and the vigor came back to his face. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LESS IS DOWN |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=LESS DOWN AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=عمودی |Target schema=کمیّت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سقوط قيمت جهاني طلا و بي‌تفاوتي بازار ايران! |Example.Gloss=Fall price world gold and indifference bazaar Iran. |Example.English translation=The international price of gold drops and indifference in the Iranian market }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=تبش پايين آمده بود و رنگ رويش بازشده بود |Example.Gloss=Fever down came had and color face-3rd open was. |Example.English translation=His fever came down and the vigor came back to his face. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=به گزارش بی بی سی فارسی، ویکتوریا نولاند، سخنگوی وزارت خارجه ایالات متحده در واکنش به کاهش بی سابقه ارزش ریال در برابر ارزهای خارجی در بازار ارز ایران، گفته است که “سقوط پول ایران” نشان دهنده موفقیت تحریم های بسیار کوبنده ای است که جامعه بین المللی به منظور متوقف کردن “برنامه هسته ای مشکوک” جمهوری اسلامی علیه این کشور وضع کرده است. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LESS IS DOWN |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=LESS DOWN AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=عمودی |Target schema=کمیّت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سقوط قيمت جهاني طلا و بي‌تفاوتي بازار ايران! |Example.Gloss=Fall price world gold and indifference bazaar Iran. |Example.English translation=The drop of international price of gold and indifference in the Iranian market }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=تبش پايين آمده بود و رنگ رويش بازشده بود |Example.Gloss=Fever down came had and color face-3rd open was. |Example.English translation=His fever came down and the vigor came back to his face. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=به گزارش بی بی سی فارسی، ویکتوریا نولاند، سخنگوی وزارت خارجه ایالات متحده در واکنش به کاهش بی سابقه ارزش ریال در برابر ارزهای خارجی در بازار ارز ایران، گفته است که “سقوط پول ایران” نشان دهنده موفقیت تحریم های بسیار کوبنده ای است که جامعه بین المللی به منظور متوقف کردن “برنامه هسته ای مشکوک” جمهوری اسلامی علیه این کشور وضع کرده است. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=LESS IS DOWN |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=experiencing one state, possession one object ast-C |Aliases= |Family=ساختار رویداد (شیء) |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=تجربۀ یک حالت |Target schema=مالکیت |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=تجربه کننده |Source=مالک }}{{Mapping |Target=حالت |Source=ما یملک }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در این روز مبارک، بیایید غم و غصه هایمان را کنار بگذاریم. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در همه جای دنیا زندگی انسان‌ها را که بگردی خوبی و بدی، زشت و زیبا و غم و شادی را کنار هم می‌بینی }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=experiencing one state, possession one object ast-C |Aliases= |Family=ساختار رویداد (شیء) |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=تجربۀ یک حالت |Target schema=مالکیت |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=تجربه کننده |Source=مالک }}{{Mapping |Target=حالت |Source=ما یملک }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در این روز مبارک، بیایید غم و غصه هایمان را کنار بگذاریم. |Example.Gloss=In this day, celebration, come sadness and stress our OBJMARKER corner put. |Example.English translation=On this day of celebration, come, let's abandon our sadness and grief. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در همه جای دنیا زندگی انسان‌ها را که بگردی خوبی و بدی، زشت و زیبا و غم و شادی را کنار هم می‌بینی |Example.Gloss=In all place world live human OBJMARKER that look goodness and badness, ugly and beautiful and sadness and happiness OBJMARKER corner also see-2nd |Example.English translation=ness next to each other. If you look at human life all around the world, you will see ugliness and beauty, sadness and happy, |Example.Comments=This example is misplaced. --Aria }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=EXPERIENCING A STATE IS POSSESSING AN OBJECT |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=experiencing one state, possession one object ast-C |Aliases= |Family=ساختار رویداد (شیء) |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=تجربۀ یک حالت |Target schema=مالکیت |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=تجربه کننده |Source=مالک }}{{Mapping |Target=حالت |Source=ما یملک }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در این روز مبارک، بیایید غم و غصه هایمان را کنار بگذاریم. |Example.Gloss=In this day, celebration, come sadness and stress our OBJMARKER corner put. |Example.English translation=On this day of celebration, come, let's abandon our sadness and grief. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در همه جای دنیا زندگی انسان‌ها را که بگردی خوبی و بدی، زشت و زیبا و غم و شادی را کنار هم می‌بینی |Example.Gloss=In all place world live human OBJMARKER that look goodness and badness, ugly and beautiful and sadness and happiness OBJMARKER corner also see-2nd |Example.English translation=If you look at human life all around the world, you will see ugliness and beauty, sadness and happiness all lined up next to each other. |Example.Comments=This example does not belong here. --Aria }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=EXPERIENCING A STATE IS POSSESSING AN OBJECT |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=experiencing one state, possession one object ast-C |Aliases= |Comments=Example(s) is inadequate, and more need be provided to support the metaphor |Family=ساختار رویداد (شیء) |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=تجربۀ یک حالت |Target schema=مالکیت |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=تجربه کننده |Source=مالک }}{{Mapping |Target=حالت |Source=ما یملک }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در این روز مبارک، بیایید غم و غصه هایمان را کنار بگذاریم. |Example.Gloss=In this day, celebration, come sadness and stress our OBJMARKER corner put. |Example.English translation=On this day of celebration, come, let's abandon our sadness and grief. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=EXPERIENCING A STATE IS POSSESSING AN OBJECT |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Paying taxation fulfilling obligation is |Aliases= |Comments=No corresponding English schema found |Family=طرح حکومت, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source schema=اخلاقیات |Target schema=پرداخت مالیات |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=درست است که پرداخت مالیات تکلیف شهروندان است، اما آن ها در این خصوص از حقوقی هم برخوردارند. |Example.Gloss=right is is that paying taxes obligation citizenry, but they in this regard from rights also possess |Example.English translation=It is right that paying taxes is an obligation for the citizenry, all the same they are entitled to some rights in this regard. |Example.Provenance=http://vakilmaghsood.ir/1391/%DA%86%D8%B1%D8%A7-%D8%A7%D8%B2-%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%AA-%D9%85%D8%A7%D9%84%DB%8C%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D9%81%D8%B1%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D9%85%DB%8C-%DA%A9%D9%86%DB%8C%D9%85%D8%9F%D8%AC%D8%A7%DB%8C-%D8%AE/ }} |Entered by=sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Paying taxation fulfilling obligation is |Aliases= |Comments=No corresponding English schema found |Family=طرح حکومت, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source schema=اخلاقیات |Target schema=پرداخت مالیات |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=درست است که پرداخت مالیات تکلیف شهروندان است، اما آن ها در این خصوص از حقوقی هم برخوردارند. |Example.Gloss=right is is that paying taxes obligation citizenry, but they in this regard from rights also possess |Example.English translation=It is right that paying taxes is an obligation for the citizenry, all the same they are entitled to some rights in this regard. |Example.Provenance=http://vakilmaghsood.ir/1391/%DA%86%D8%B1%D8%A7-%D8%A7%D8%B2-%D9%BE%D8%B1%D8%AF%D8%A7%D8%AE%D8%AA-%D9%85%D8%A7%D9%84%DB%8C%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D9%81%D8%B1%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D9%85%DB%8C-%DA%A9%D9%86%DB%8C%D9%85%D8%9F%D8%AC%D8%A7%DB%8C-%D8%AE/ }} |Entered by=sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=Impact is color |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=نقش |Target schema=رنگ |Mappings={{Mapping}} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=نقش پررنگ شبکه‌های اجتماعی در انتخابات افغانستان |Example.Gloss=role dark-colored networks social in elections Afghanistan |Example.English translation=The influential role of social networks in the [presidential] elections of Afghanistan |Example.Provenance=http://www.bbc.co.uk/persian/afghanistan/2014/04/140401_zs_elections_social_media.shtml |Example.Comments=The key term here is "pur-rang" meaning darker shades of color, characterizing the influence of social networks as powerful or critical }} |Entered by=Aria Fani, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.comment: صفحه‌ای جدید حاوی '{{Metaphor |Name gloss=cause root ast-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Mappings= |Related me...' ایجاد کرد
Jhong صفحهٔ [[علت ریشه است]] را بدون برجای‌گذاشتن تغییرمسیر به [[Metaphor:علت ریشه است]] منتقل کرد: جایگزینی متن - '^(.*)$' به 'Metaphor:$1'

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=cause root ast-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex, Entailed |Source schema=ریشه |Target schema=علت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=آیت‌الله هاشمی شاهرودی گفت : مسوولان عالی‌رتبه کشور مصمم هستند که ***ریشه*** اصلی این قتلها پیدا شده و به محاکمه قضایی و عادلانه برسد و امیدواریم رایس جمهور ***دستگاه*** امنیتی کشور را از رویه‌های ناجوری که ***فساد*** در آن شکل گرفته ، ***پالایش کند***. |Example.English translation=Ayatollah Hashemi Shahrudi said: the senior officials of the country are determined that the original source of this violence be found and be taken to a fair judiciary trial. We hope that the president refines the country’s security systems’ ineffective methods which are gripped with corruption. }} |Entered by=Aria |Status=in development, proposed |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Difficulty_of paying taxes is_a physical burden |Aliases= |Tags=Program sources |Family=استعاره های مالیات |Metaphor Level=Specific |Source schema=بار فیزیکی |Target schema=سختی پرداخت مالیات |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=بر اساس گزارش ها، 72 درصد از مالیات دهندگان فرانسوی معتقدند بار سنگین مالیات به آنها ضررهای زیادی را وارد کرده است. |Example.Gloss=on basis reports, 72 percent of tax payers french believe burden heavy taxation to them damage much has caused |Example.English translation=According to reports, 72 percent of French taxpayers believe the heavy burden of taxation has caused them much damage |Example.Provenance=http://www.yjc.ir/fa/news/4594612/%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%B1-%D8%B3%D9%86%DA%AF%DB%8C%D9%86-%D9%85%D8%A7%D9%84%DB%8C%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%A8%D8%B1-%D8%AF%D9%88%D8%B4-%D9%85%D8%B1%D8%AF%D9%85-%D9%81%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%B3%D9%87 }} |Entered by=Reza |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=auto imported }}

page.title: Metaphor:تجربۀ مشکلات ناشی از فقر حمل بار سنگین فیزیکی است

revision.comment: صفحه‌ای جدید حاوی «{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Source schema=حمل بار سنگین |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={...» ایجاد کرد
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases= |Source schema=حمل بار سنگین |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=اگر از داخل حیات فعلی جامعه ایران اوضاع را بنگریم، اگر دچار فقر روز به روز فزاینده باشیم و آن را در دیگران هم ببینیم، اگر ببینیم که زیر بار فقر و از ترس فلاکت بیشتری که در پیش است، چگونه بند بند پیوندهای اجتماعی بریده می‌شود و افسردگی خصیصه اکثریت افراد شده و روابط اجتماعی هم بیشتر و بیشتر بر پایه ترس و آز قرار می‌گیرند، آن‌گاه ممکن است فکر کنیم که سیاست‌های جاری جمهوری اسلامی در رفتن به راه‌هایی که گسترش فقر روز افزون نتیجه محتوم‌شان است، سیاست‌هایی اکیدا نامعقول هستند |Example.Provenance= http://mikhak.info/?p=624 }} |Entered by=Aria and Sanam, |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Experiencing problems caused_by poverty is carrying heavy loads |Aliases= |Source schema=حمل بار سنگین |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=اگر از داخل حیات فعلی جامعه ایران اوضاع را بنگریم، اگر دچار فقر روز به روز فزاینده باشیم و آن را در دیگران هم ببینیم، اگر ببینیم که زیر بار فقر و از ترس فلاکت بیشتری که در پیش است، چگونه بند بند پیوندهای اجتماعی بریده می‌شود و افسردگی خصیصه اکثریت افراد شده و روابط اجتماعی هم بیشتر و بیشتر بر پایه ترس و آز قرار می‌گیرند، آن‌گاه ممکن است فکر کنیم که سیاست‌های جاری جمهوری اسلامی در رفتن به راه‌هایی که گسترش فقر روز افزون نتیجه محتوم‌شان است، سیاست‌هایی اکیدا نامعقول هستند |Example.Provenance=http://mikhak.info/?p=624 }} |Entered by=Aria and Sanam, |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Democracy is a_commodity |Aliases= |Family=استعاره دموکراسی |Source schema=کالا |Target schema=دموکراسی |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=احمد رافت در گفتگو با عباس معروفی: «همیشه وقتی از من راجع به دموکراسی می‌پرسند یا از این مقولات مدرنتر، می‌گویم آقا دموکراسی خریدنی‌ نیست، بردنی نیست، هدیه هم نیست. |Example.Gloss=Ahmad Rafat in covnersation with Abbas Maroufi: always when from me about on democracy ask or from this concepts more_modern, say sir democracy for_sale is_not, winnable is_not, gift also is_not |Example.English translation=Ahmad Rafat, in conversation with Abbas Maroufi: always when I am asked about democracy or these modern concepts, I say, sir, democracy is not to be sold, won or [given as] gift. |Example.Provenance=http://zamaaneh.com/maroufi/2008/04/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=کسادی دکان دموکراسی فروشی غربی‌ها |Example.Gloss=Stagnation shop democracy selling Westerners |Example.English translation=The stagnation of the market of democracy-selling Westerners |Example.Provenance=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=13930404000077 }} |Entered by=Reza |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=DEMOCRATIC IDEOLOGY IS A COMMODITY |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=election war ast-COP |Aliases= |Tags=governance metaphors, |Family=حکومت, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=جنگ |Target schema=انتخابات |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ستاد انتخابات جبهه ایستادگی در تهران آغاز به کار می‌کند |Example.Gloss=compaign election-pl front resistance in Tehran begin to work do-prog |Example.English translation=The Front resistance compaign" just began today " |Example.Provenance=http://isna.ir/fa/news/91092816695/%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%A7%D8%AF-%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%AA%D8%AE%D8%A7%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%AC%D8%A8%D9%87%D9%87-%D8%A7%DB%8C%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%A7%D8%AF%DA%AF%DB%8C-%D8%AF%D8%B1-%D8%AA%D9%87%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%A2%D8%BA%D8%A7%D8%B2 |Example.Comments=The word Jebhe=fron and moghavemat=resistance have a very different frame in Farsi }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ELECTION IS WAR |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=elections war ast-COP |Aliases= |Comments=This metaphor needs to be justified as far as its use in Persian letters goes.The example provided is misconstrued and does not support the metaphor of "Election is War." The example reads: "The electoral campaign of 'the resistance front' will begin working in Tehran. Jibhah-i muqavimat [resistance front] is the name of a campaign, reflective of the political party it supports. It does not discuss elections in the context of war. Please advise |Tags=governance metaphors, |Family=حکومت, |Metaphor Level=Specific |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=جنگ |Target schema=انتخابات |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ستاد انتخابات جبهه ایستادگی در تهران آغاز به کار می‌کند |Example.Gloss=compaign election-pl front resistance in Tehran begin to work do-prog |Example.English translation=The Front resistance compaign" just began today " |Example.Provenance=http://isna.ir/fa/news/91092816695/%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%A7%D8%AF-%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%AA%D8%AE%D8%A7%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%AA-%D8%AC%D8%A8%D9%87%D9%87-%D8%A7%DB%8C%D8%B3%D8%AA%D8%A7%D8%AF%DA%AF%DB%8C-%D8%AF%D8%B1-%D8%AA%D9%87%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%A2%D8%BA%D8%A7%D8%B2 |Example.Comments=Jibhah-i muqavimat [resistance front] is the name of the campaign, the usage is not remotely metaphorical. This example needs to be further reviewed. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ELECTION IS WAR |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=elections war ast-COP |Aliases= |Comments=This metaphor needs to be justified as far as its use in Persian letters goes.The example provided is misconstrued and does not support the metaphor of "Election is War." The example reads: "The electoral campaign of 'the resistance front' will begin working in Tehran. Jibhah-i muqavimat [resistance front] is the name of a campaign, reflective of the political party it supports. It does not discuss elections in the context of war. {{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy watery |Aliases= |Family=استعاره دموکراسی |Source schema=نوشیدنی |Target schema=دموکراسی‌ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Reza |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy watery |Aliases= |Comments=Weak or dysfunctional democracy is characterized as watery in Persian for liquids take the shape of things around them and have no foundation or substance. The implication is that democracy, as a governing system, needs to be founded upon a solid foundation (social justice, political liberties, etc) and that is why a weak democracy behaves the way liquids do: taking the shape of whatever system exists in society, whether a system of economic disparity or social egaliteranism. "Watery" is used to describe other things as well, for instance "Your joke was watery" or "This film was watery." |Family=استعاره دموکراسی |Source schema=نوشیدنی |Target schema=دموکراسی‌ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Reza and Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy watery |Aliases= |Comments=Weak or dysfunctional democracy is characterized as watery in Persian for liquids take the shape of things around them and have no foundation or substance. The implication is that democracy, as a governing system, needs to be founded upon a solid foundation (social justice, political liberties, etc) and that is why a weak democracy behaves the way liquids do: taking the shape of whatever system exists in society, whether a system of economic disparity or social egaliteranism. "Watery" is used to describe other things as well, for instance "Your joke was watery" or "This film was watery. Here it implies the film's narrative was not substantial or the joke lacked content. ." |Family=استعاره دموکراسی |Source schema=نوشیدنی |Target schema=دموکراسی‌ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Reza and Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy watery |Aliases= |Comments=Weak or dysfunctional democracy is characterized as watery in Persian for liquids take the shape of things around them and have no foundation or substance. The implication is that democracy, as a governing system, needs to be founded upon a solid foundation (social justice, political liberties, etc) and that is why a weak democracy behaves the way liquids do: taking the shape of whatever system exists in society, whether applied to a social system of economic disparity or economic egaliteranism; it takes their shape. "Watery" is used to describe other things as well, implying that they are void of value, substance, or importance. For instance "Your joke was watery" or "This film was watery. Here it implies the film's narrative was not substantial or the joke lacked content. ." |Family=استعاره دموکراسی |Source schema=نوشیدنی |Target schema=دموکراسی‌ |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Reza and Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=PROGRESS DO-INT EXPANSION AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=وی در گزارشی با عنوان پدیده فساد و رابطه آن با توسعه اقتصادی در ایران به رادیو فرانسه اظهار داشته است : سخنگویان قوه قضاایه جمهوری اسلامی می‌گویند که فعال کردن اصل ۱۴۲ قانون اساسی بهترین راه مبارزه با فساد و تبعیض در جامعه ایرانی است . |Example.English translation=Regarding the phenomenon of corruption and its connection to economic development, he reports on French radio: Speakers of the judicial branch of the Islamic republic say that the activation of the original 142 basic laws is the best way to combat corruption and discrimination in Iran society. }} |Entered by=Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=PROGRESS DO-INF EXPANSION AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=وی در گزارشی با عنوان پدیده فساد و رابطه آن با توسعه اقتصادی در ایران به رادیو فرانسه اظهار داشته است : سخنگویان قوه قضاایه جمهوری اسلامی می‌گویند که فعال کردن اصل ۱۴۲ قانون اساسی بهترین راه مبارزه با فساد و تبعیض در جامعه ایرانی است . |Example.English translation=Regarding the phenomenon of corruption and its connection to economic development, he reports on French radio: Speakers of the judicial branch of the Islamic republic say that the activation of the original 142 basic laws is the best way to combat corruption and discrimination in Iran society. }} |Entered by=Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

New example needed |Tags=governance metaphors |Family=حکومت |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=تسعه |Target schema=پیشرفت کردن |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=وی در گزارشی با عنوان پدیده فساد و رابطه آن با توسعه اقتصادی در ایران به رادیو فرانسه اظهار داشته است : سخنگویان قوه قضاییه جمهوری اسلامی می‌گویند که فعال کردن اصل ۱۴۲ قانون اساسی بهترین راه مبارزه با فساد و تبعیض در جامعه ایرانی است . |Example.English translation=Regarding the phenomenon of corruption and its connection to economic development, he reports on French radio: Speakers of the judicial branch of the Islamic republic say that the activation of the original 142 basic laws is the best way to combat corruption and discrimination in Iran society. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=goodness light ast-cop |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=نور |Target schema=خوبی |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=خوبی |Source=نور }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سازمان عدالت و آزادی ایران اسلامی” که فراهم آمده از ایمان، روشن بینی و همت فرهیختگان درد آشنا به خصوص جوانان عزیز است، می تواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب اسلامی و ملت شریف ایران داشته است. |Example.Gloss=Organization justice and freedom Iran Islamic that prepared came from faith, bright sight and thanks scholars pain familiar especially youth dear ast-COP, MI can and must focal be for reaching to goal PLURAL long that Islam, revolution Islamic and nation noble Iran have does. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOODNESS IS LIGHT |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=goodness light ast-cop |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=نور |Target schema=خوبی |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=خوبی |Source=نور }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سازمان عدالت و آزادی ایران اسلامی” که فراهم آمده از ایمان، روشن بینی و همت فرهیختگان درد آشنا به خصوص جوانان عزیز است، می تواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب اسلامی و ملت شریف ایران داشته است. |Example.Gloss=Organization justice and freedom Iran Islamic that prepared came from faith, bright sight and thanks scholars pain familiar to special youth dear ast-COP, MI can and must focal be for reaching to goal PLURAL long that Islam, revolution Islamic and nation noble Iran have does. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=GOODNESS IS LIGHT |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=goodness light ast-cop |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=نور |Target schema=خوبی |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=خوبی |Source=نور }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سازمان عدالت و آزادی ایران اسلامی” که فراهم آمده از ایمان، روشن بینی و همت فرهیختگان درد آشنا به خصوص جوانان عزیز است، می تواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب اسلامی و ملت شریف ایران داشته است. |Example.Gloss=Organization justice and freedom Iran Islamic that prepared came from faith, bright sight and thanks scholars pain familiar to special youth dear ast-COP, MI can and must focal be for reaching to goal PLURAL long that Islam, revolution Islamic and nation noble Iran have does. |Example.English translation=The organization for justice and freedom of Islamic Iran is founded upon faith, the clairvoyance and efforts of scholars, and especially, the pain of our dear youth. {{Metaphor |Name gloss=to-hand bring target, arrive-INF to destination ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=بدست آوردن هدف |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خوشحالم که بالاخره به هدفت رسیدی |Example.Gloss=glad-1sg that finally to target-2sg-poss arrive-pst-2sg |Example.English translation=I am glad you finally reached your goal. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=to-hand bring target, arrive-INF to destination ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=بدست آوردن هدف |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خوشحالم که بالاخره به هدفت رسیدی |Example.Gloss=glad-1sg that finally to target-2sg-poss arrive-pst-2sg |Example.English translation=I am glad you finally reached your goal. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=این واقعیات نشان می‌دهد که اگر چه راه ملت ایران بسوی آرمان‌ها، ‌دارای چالش است اما بن بستی در این راه وجود ندارد. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=to-hand bring target, arrive-INF to destination ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=بدست آوردن هدف |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خوشحالم که بالاخره به هدفت رسیدی |Example.Gloss=glad-1sg that finally to target-2sg-poss arrive-pst-2sg |Example.English translation=I am glad you finally reached your goal. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=این واقعیات نشان می‌دهد که اگر چه راه ملت ایران بسوی آرمان‌ها، ‌دارای چالش است اما بن بستی در این راه وجود ندارد. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=در بخشی از این پیام سیدمحمد خاتمی سازمان عدالت و آزادی ایران اسلامی را فراهم آمده از ایمان، روشن بینی و همت فرهیختگان درد آشنا به خصوص جوانان عزیز دانست و خاطر نشان ساخت: این سازمان می تواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب و ملت شریف ایران داشته است. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=to-hand bring target, arrive-INF to destination ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=بدست آوردن هدف |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خوشحالم که بالاخره به هدفت رسیدی |Example.Gloss=glad-1sg that finally to target-2sg-poss arrive-pst-2sg |Example.English translation=I am glad you finally reached your goal. |Example.Provenance=Sanam }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خاتمی: این سازمان می تواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب و ملت شریف ایران داشته است |Example.Gloss=khatami: This organization -prog-can.present-3sg and should focal become to goal-pl long-indef ke Islam, revolution and nation honorable Iran have.imp ast-cop |Example.English translation=Khatami: this organization can and should become a center for reaching the ultimate goals that Islam has for the revolution and the honorable nation of Iran. |Example.Comments=The word "long=boland" has a different frame. It is used to refer to loud "loud voice" tall "tall person" and high "high elevation" and others }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text= انسان بی هدف به مقصد نهایی خود نمی رسد وبا داشتن هدف در زندگی مشترک جهت نیل به مقصد نهایی که همان خوشبختی وآرامش می باشد خواهند رسید |Example.Gloss=Human goal-less to ultimate destination self neg-prog-reach-prest-3sg and with have-infin goal in life mutual direction toward ultimate destination that identical happiness and tranquility prog-be.prest-3sg will-3pl reach-pres-pefc |Example.English translation=A person without goal will not reach its ultimate destination and by having a goal in his/her marriage, he/she will reach his/her ultimate destination which is happiness and tranquility }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text= انسان بی هدف به مقصد نهایی خود نمی رسد وبا داشتن هدف در زندگی مشترک جهت نیل به مقصد نهایی که همان خوشبختی وآرامش می باشد خواهند رسید |Example.Gloss=Human goal-less to ultimate destination self neg-prog-reach-prest-3sg and with have-infin goal in life mutual direction toward ultimate destination that identical happiness and tranquility prog-be.prest-3sg will-3pl reach-pres-pefc |Example.English translation=A person without goal will not reach its ultimate destination and by having a goal in his/her marriage, he/she will reach his/her ultimate destination which is happiness and tranquility |Example.Provenance=http://www.sarachehnaz.blogfa.com |Example.Comments=The frames for "goal" and " ultimate destination" evoke eachother and are usually used as pairs the relation between the morphology of the word "maghsad" is important }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ترکیه گام به گام در حال نزدیکتر شدن به اهداف صادراتی خود است. |Example.Gloss=Turkey step to step in moment-e close-comp become to goal-pl export self ast-cop |Example.English translation=Turkey is getting closer to its export goals step by step }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=to-hand bring target, arrive-INF to destination ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary, Entailed |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=بدست آوردن هدف |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خوشحالم که بالاخره به هدفت رسیدی |Example.Gloss=glad-1sg that finally to target-2sg-poss arrive-pst-2sg |Example.English translation=I am glad you finally reached your goal. |Example.Provenance=Sanam }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=خاتمی: این سازمان میتواند و باید کانونی باشد برای رسیدن به هدف های بلندی که اسلام، انقلاب و ملت شریف ایران داشته است |Example.Gloss=khatami: This organization prog-can.present-3sg and should focal become to goal-pl long-indef ke Islam, revolution and nation honorable Iran have.imp ast-cop |Example.English translation=Khatami: this organization can and should become a center for reaching the ultimate goals that Islam has for the revolution and the honorable nation of Iran. |Example.Provenance=http://www.irangreenvoice.com/article/2011/may/20/13136 |Example.Comments=The word "long=boland" has a different frame. It is used to refer to loud "loud voice" tall "tall person" and high "high elevation" and others }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=انسان بی هدف به مقصد نهایی خود نمی رسد وبا داشتن هدف در زندگی مشترک جهت نیل به مقصد نهایی که همان خوشبختی وآرامش می باشد خواهند رسید |Example.Gloss=Human goal-less to ultimate destination self neg-prog-reach-prest-3sg and with have-infin goal in life mutual direction toward ultimate destination that identical happiness and tranquility prog-be.prest-3sg will-3pl reach-pres-pefc |Example.English translation=A person without goal will not reach its ultimate destination and by having a goal in his/her marriage, he/she will reach his/her ultimate destination which is happiness and tranquility |Example.Provenance=http://www.sarachehnaz.blogfa.com |Example.Comments=The frames for "goal" and " ultimate destination" evoke eachother and are usually used as pairs the relation between the morphology of the word "maghsad" is important }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ترکیه گام به گام در حال نزدیکتر شدن به اهداف صادراتی خود است. |Example.Gloss=Turkey step to step in moment-e close-comp become to goal-pl export self ast-cop |Example.English translation=Turkey is getting closer to its export goals step by step |Example.Provenance=http://www.trtpersian.com }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

It is used to refer to loud "loud voice" tall "tall person" and high "high elevation" and others }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=انسان بی هدف به مقصد نهایی خود نمی رسد وبا داشتن هدف در زندگی مشترک جهت نیل به مقصد نهایی که همان خوشبختی وآرامش می باشد خواهند رسید |Example.Gloss=Human goal-less to ultimate destination self neg-prog-reach-prest-3sg and with have-infin goal in life mutual direction toward ultimate destination that identical happiness and tranquility prog-be.prest-3sg will-3pl reach-pres-pefc |Example.English translation=A person without goal will not reach its ultimate destination and by having a goal in his/her marriage, he/she will reach his/her ultimate destination which is happiness and tranquility |Example.Provenance=http://www.sarachehnaz.blogfa.com |Example.Comments=The frames for "goal" and " ultimate destination" evoke eachother and are usually used as pairs the relation between the morphology of the word "maghsad" is important }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=action, move-N self-work in along trajectory ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=عمل |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=عمل کردن، حرکت کردن در راستای مسیر است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=هر کسی با توجه به توانائی های خود برای رسیدن به سعادت خود باید راه و طریق مناسب و معقولانه آن را شناخته و دنبال کند |Example.Gloss=every person with attention to ability-pl self for reach-inf to bliss self should path and way appropriate and reasonable that ra-objmarker know-imp and followd do-3sg |Example.English translation=Every one, in order to reach their happiness, should find the right and reasonable way to follow that path |Example.Provenance=http://www.cloob.com/timeline/article_43977_2936 }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACTION IS SELF-PROPELLED MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=action, move-N self-work in along trajectory ast-COP |Aliases= |Family=ساختار واقعه (حرکت) |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت ارادی در راستای مسیر |Target schema=عمل |Mappings= |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is a source subcase of |Related metaphor.Name=عمل کردن، حرکت کردن در راستای مسیر است }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=هر کسی با توجه به توانائی های خود برای رسیدن به سعادت خود باید راه و طریق مناسب و معقولانه آن را شناخته و دنبال کند |Example.Gloss=every person with attention to ability-pl self for reach-inf to bliss self should path and way appropriate and reasonable that ra-objmarker know-imp and followd do-3sg |Example.English translation=Every one, in order to reach their happiness, should find the right and reasonable way to follow that path |Example.Provenance=http://www.cloob.com/timeline/article_43977_2936 }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ترکیه گام به گام در حال نزدیکتر شدن به اهداف صادراتی خود است. |Example.Gloss=Turkey step to step in moment-e close-comp become to goal-pl export self ast-cop |Example.English translation=Turkey is (continuously) getting closer to its export goals step by step |Example.Provenance=http://www.trtpersian.com }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=ACTION IS SELF-PROPELLED MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=CORRUPTION DECAY AST-COP |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=فساد اخلاقی\اجتماعی، فساد است }} |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Experiential basis=ابتذال |Source schema=فساد |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=رهبری کشوری حزب بعث سوریه دو هفته پیش محمود الزعبی را به دلیل فساد مالی و سوأاستفاده از قدرت در دوره نخست‌وزیری ، از حزب اخراج و وی را برای محاکمه به دادگاه معرفی کرده بود .` |Example.English translation=The national leader of oppressive sect of syria, 2 weeks ago, expelled Mahmood alzabi charged for economic corruption and abuse of power in his preminestry period. He also presented Al-azabi to court for trial }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=سید محمد خاتمی با تاکید بر اینکه “آزادی محافل علمی و دانشگاهی و رسانه ای خود عامل بزرگ جلوگیری از فساد و مبارزه با فساد است. }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=CORRUPTION IS DECAY |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Corruption is decay |Aliases={{Metaphor.Alias |Metaphor.Alias.Name=فساد اخلاقی\اجتماعی، فساد است }} |Tags=governance metaphors |Family=حکومت |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=ابتذال |Target schema=فساد |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=فساد دولت ها را مي پوساند |Example.Gloss=corruption governments decay |Example.English translation=Corruption causes governments to decay |Example.Provenance=http://zaaren.blogspot.com/ }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=ذهن مردم با فساد خراب می‌شود نه مبارزه با فسا |Example.Gloss=Mind masses with corruption decay becomes no battle with corruption |Example.English translation=The minds of the masses becomes decayed due to corruption, not counter-corruption battles |Example.Provenance=http://alef.ir/vdcb80b8grhbs8p.uiur.html?15txt }} |Entered by=Aria, Sanam |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=CORRUPTION IS DECAY |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text: {{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=چون این سوالی است که خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=Since this question ast-COP that myself sit-1st-PAST-NEG see that solution in program see-2ndPl or not. |Example.English translation=Since whether or not this program will provide a solution is an issue which I did not sit down and consider. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=KNOWING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=چون این سوالی است که خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=Since this question ast-COP that myself sit-1st-PAST-NEG see that solution in program see-2ndPl or not. |Example.English translation=Since a question which I did not sit down and consider myself is whether or not this program will provide a solution. |Example.Comments=See is used twice in this example. Only the first usage of see, translated as ‘consider’ is relevant to knowing is seeing }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=KNOWING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=چون این سوالی است که خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=Since this question ast-COP that myself sit-1st-PAST-NEG see that solution in program see-2ndPl or not. |Example.English translation=Since a question which I did not sit down and consider myself is whether or not this program will provide a solution. |Example.Comments=See is used twice in this example. Only the first usage of see, translated as ‘consider’ is relevant to knowing is seeing I think the second one is also used 'as knowing is seeing', however I agree it seems to have a slightly different usage. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=نامه ۱۴۳ فعال سیاسی به خاتمی: چشم‌انداز روشنی برای انتخابات سالم وجود ندارد. |Example.Comments=Using light as an entailed metaphor to ' knowing is seeing' is even more common ( more central) than 'knowing is seeing' in Farsi. This word determins the level of how tranparency: Roshan del, Roshan zamir, Roshan bin }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=KNOWING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=برای این سوال خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=for this question self-1sg sat-1sg-pst see-present(doubt) ke solution-(path-work) in program(plan) see-2ndPl-present prog or no |Example.English translation=For this question I, myself, sat down to see wheather I can find a solution for the plan or not
|Example.Comments=See is used twice in this example. Only the first usage of see, translated as ‘consider’ is relevant to knowing is seeing I think the second one is also used 'as knowing is seeing', however I agree it seems to have a slightly different usage. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=نامه ۱۴۳ فعال سیاسی به خاتمی: چشم‌انداز روشنی برای انتخابات سالم وجود ندارد. |Example.Comments=Using light as an entailed metaphor to ' knowing is seeing' is even more common ( more central) than 'knowing is seeing' in Farsi. This word determins the level of how tranparency: Roshan del, Roshan zamir, Roshan bin }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=KNOWING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=برای این سوال خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=For this question self-1sg sit-1sg-pst see-present(doubt) ke solution-(path-work) in program(plan) see-2ndPl-present prog or no |Example.English translation=For this question I, myself, searched carefully to know wheather there is a solution for the plan or not |Example.Comments=See is used twice in this example. Only the first usage of see, translated as ‘consider’ is relevant to knowing is seeing I think the second one is entailed to'knowing is seeing',but first one is used differently as thinking is perceiving.Sanam }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=نامه ۱۴۳ فعال سیاسی به خاتمی: چشم‌انداز روشنی برای انتخابات سالم وجود ندارد. |Example.Comments=Using light as an entailed metaphor to ' knowing is seeing' is even more common ( more central) than 'knowing is seeing' in Farsi. This word determins the level of how tranparency: Roshan del, Roshan zamir, Roshan bin }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=KNOWING IS SEEING |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=KNOWING SEEING AST-COP |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=دیدن |Target schema=دانستن |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=موجودی که میبیند |Source=بیننده }}{{Mapping |Target=ذهن |Source=چسم }} |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=برای این سوال خودم نشستم ببینم که راهکاری در برنامه می‌بینیم یا نه. |Example.Gloss=For this question self-1sg sit-1sg-pst see-present(doubt) ke solution-(path-work) in program(plan) see-2ndPl-present prog or no |Example.English translation=For this question I, myself, searched carefully to know whether there is a solution for the plan or not |Example.Comments=See is used twice in this example. Aria I think the second one is entailed to'knowing is seeing', but first one is used differently which is in the mapping of thinking is perceiving.Sanam }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=نامه ۱۴۳ فعال سیاسی به خاتمی: چشم‌انداز روشنی برای انتخابات سالم وجود ندارد. |Example.Gloss=letter 143 activist political to Khatami: view ( eye-fall,landmark) bright for elections healthy exist have-neg |Example.Comments=Using light as an entailed metaphor to ' knowing is seeing' is even more common ( more central) than 'knowing is seeing' in Farsi. revision.comment: صفحه‌ای جدید حاوی «{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Investigated for=Persian }}» ایجاد کرد
revision.text: {{Metaphor |Aliases= |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples= |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=احمدی نژاد: یک چیز باید حتی برای بدترین دشمنان ما هم واضع باشد: این ملت در برابر فشار دشمنان مقاومت مقدس و فوق العاده ای شان داده است و حلا ذرهای از حقنخواهد هستهای خود عقب نشینی نخواهد کرد. |Example.English translation=Ahmadinejad: One thing which must be clear, even for our worst enemies is that: this nation has shown an outrageous holy resistance in confronting the enemies pressure, and now it will not retreat from its nuclear right even a bit. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |LinkEnglish=DIPLOMACY IS WAR |Investigated for=Persian }}

It is good but not that much as one gets diphtheria }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=بنابراین نمی‌توان مدعی دولت تدبیر و دوراندیشی شد و در این افق از قانون شکنی، خلاءهای دموکراسی و پیامدهای ناشی از آن غفلت کرد. |Example.Gloss=So one can not claim the wisdom and foresight and in this vision of violations, gaps in democracy and its consequences be neglected. }} |Entered by=Reza |Status=in development |Program alias=Democracy |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=democracy location is |Aliases= |Family=استعاره دموکراسی‌ |Metaphor Type=Composed/complex |Source schema=مکان |Target schema=دموکراسی‌ |Mappings={{Mapping |Target=مکان |Source=دموکراسی‌ }} |Related metaphors={{Related metaphor |Related metaphor.Relation type=is in some target relation to |Related metaphor.Name=دموکراسی‌ کالا است. }} |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=دموكراسي هم حدي دارد . خوب است اما نه به اندازه اي كه آدم حناق بگيرد. |Example.Gloss=democracy also limit a has. good is but not as much so that one gets diphtheria |Example.English translation=Democracy has a limit, too. It is good but not that much as one gets diphtheria }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=بنابراین نمی‌توان مدعی دولت تدبیر و دوراندیشی شد و در این افق از قانون شکنی، خلاءهای دموکراسی و پیامدهای ناشی از آن غفلت کرد. |Example.Gloss=So one can not claim the wisdom and foresight and in this vision of violations, gaps in democracy and its consequences be neglected. }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text= ديوان عالي پاكستان به حاكم نظامي اين كشور سه سال فرصت داد تا مؤموريتش را تكميل و انتخابات عمومي برگزار كند و بدين ترتيب اميدهاي بازگشت پاكستان به دموكراسي را زنده كرد |Example.Gloss=Supreme court of Pakistan to ruler military of this country three years opportunity gave in order to mission complete and elections general conduct, and in this way hopes of return of pakistan to democracy (he) revitalized. |Example.English translation= Pakistan's supreme court gave the country's military leader three years so that he would complete his mission and hold general elections, and as such revitalized the hope of Pakistan's return to democracy. |Example.Annotation=The key term here is "returned" which indicates a condition or location in which Pakistan previously was }} |Entered by=Reza |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Program alias=Democracy |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=پیشرفت |Example.Gloss=move-forward |Example.English translation=progress |Example.Comments=The word by itself presents the metaphor }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=لیکن از همین آثار هم مى‌توان به پیشرفت خارق‌العاده هنر در مصر ، الجزایر ، مراکش ، بنگلادش و سبقت آنها از کشورمان پى برد . |Example.Gloss=however from these works also can to progress extraordinary art in Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Bangladesh and overtake their from our-country realize. |Example.English translation=However, by looking at these works one can realize the extraordinary progress of art in Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Bangladesh and overtaking our country. |Example.Comments=Progress as overtaking in the road }} |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=progress is move-ind toward to forward |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت رو به جلو |Target schema=پیشرفت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=همکاری 1+5 تضمینی بر حرکت روبه جلو مذاکرات است |Example.Gloss=collaboration 5+1 assurance on move toward forward negotiation-pl ast-cop |Example.English translation=Collaborating with 5+1 group is an assurance for making progress in our negotiations |Example.Provenance=http://ilna.ir/news/news.cfm?id=52334 |Example.Comments=The word 'progress=pish-raft' by itself presents the metaphor etymologically the word "ru" should should be frames as it means face and toward
}}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=لیکن از همین آثار هم مى‌توان به پیشرفت خارق‌العاده هنر در مصر ، الجزایر ، مراکش ، بنگلادش و سبقت آنها از کشورمان پى برد . |Example.Gloss=however from these works also can to progress extraordinary art in Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Bangladesh and overtake their from our-country realize . |Example.English translation=However, by looking at these works one can realize the extraordinary progress of art in Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Bangladesh and overtaking our country. |Example.Comments=Progress as overtaking in the road }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian }} |Entered by=Behrang |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

revision.text:
{{Metaphor |Name gloss=progress is move-ind toward to forward |Aliases= |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت رو به جلو |Target schema=پیشرفت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=همکاری 1+5 تضمینی بر حرکت روبه جلو مذاکرات است |Example.Gloss=collaboration 5+1 assurance on move toward forward negotiation-pl ast-cop |Example.English translation=Collaborating with 5+1 group is an assurance for making progress in our negotiations |Example.Provenance=http://ilna.ir/news/news.cfm?id=52334 |Example.Comments=The word 'progress=pish-raft' by itself presents the metaphor etymologically the word "ru" should should be frames as it means face and toward
}}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=لیکن از همین آثار هم مى‌توان به پیشرفت خارق‌العاده هنر در مصر ، الجزایر ، مراکش ، بنگلادش و سبقت آنها از کشورمان پى برد . |Example.Gloss=however from these works also can to progress extraordinary art in Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Bangladesh and overtake their from our-country realize . |Example.English translation=However, by looking at these works one can realize the extraordinary progress of art in Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Bangladesh and overtaking our country. |Example.Comments=Progress as overtaking in the road }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian }} |Entered by=Behrang |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=progress is move.inf face to forward ast.cop |Aliases= |Comments=The word for progress, " Pishraft" etymologically is N-V compound derived from two free morphemes " Pish" "front" and "raft" "go.nonfin" so the word itself immidiately gives the schema of movement toward front upon its usage |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت رو به جلو |Target schema=پیشرفت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=همکاری 1+5 تضمینی بر حرکت روبه جلو مذاکرات است |Example.Gloss=collaboration 5+1 assurance on move toward forward negotiation-pl ast-cop |Example.English translation=Collaborating with 5+1 group is an assurance for making progress in our negotiations |Example.Provenance=http://ilna.ir/news/news.cfm?id=52334 |Example.Comments=The word 'progress=pish-raft' by itself presents the metaphor etymologically the word "ru" should should be frames as it means face and toward }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=لیکن از همین آثار هم مى‌توان به پیشرفت خارق‌العاده هنر در مصر ، الجزایر ، مراکش ، بنگلادش و سبقت آنها از کشورمان پى برد . |Example.Gloss=however from these works also can to progress extraordinary art in Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Bangladesh and overtake their from our-country realize . |Example.English translation=However, by looking at these works one can realize the extraordinary progress of art in Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Bangladesh and overtaking our country. |Example.Comments=Progress as overtaking in the road }} |Entered by=Behrang |Last reviewed by=Sanam |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Progress is moving forward |Aliases= |Comments=The word for progress, " Pishraft" etymologically is N-V compound derived from two free morphemes " Pish" "front" and "raft" "go.nonfin" so the word itself immidiately gives the schema of movement toward front upon its usage |Metaphor Level=General |Metaphor Type=Primary |Source schema=حرکت رو به جلو |Target schema=پیشرفت |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=همکاری 1+5 تضمینی بر حرکت روبه جلو مذاکرات است |Example.Gloss=collaboration 5+1 assurance on move toward forward negotiation-pl ast-cop |Example.English translation=Collaborating with 5+1 group is an assurance for making progress in our negotiations |Example.Provenance=http://ilna.ir/news/news.cfm?id=52334 |Example.Comments=The word 'progress=pish-raft' by itself presents the metaphor etymologically the word "ru" should should be frames as it means face and toward }}{{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=لیکن از همین آثار هم مى‌توان به پیشرفت خارق‌العاده هنر در مصر ، الجزایر ، مراکش ، بنگلادش و سبقت آنها از کشورمان پى برد . |Example.Gloss=however from these works also can to progress extraordinary art in Egypt , Algeria , Morocco , Bangladesh and overtake their from our-country realize . |Example.English translation=However, by looking at these works one can realize the extraordinary progress of art in Egypt, Algeria, Morocco, Bangladesh and overtaking our country. |Example.Comments=Progress as overtaking in the road }} |Entered by=Behrang |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |LinkEnglish=PROGRESS IS FORWARD MOTION ALONG A PATH |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Aliases= |Source schema=پیکار با نیرویی متخاصم |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=اما دولت برای مقابله با گرانی پسته با تصمیمی شتاب‌زده مانع از صادرات 200 هزار تن پسته شد تا قیمت را کاهش دهد در صورتی که می توانست با تدبیری درست قیمت پسته را کاهش دهد نه مانع از صادرات آن شود. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Controlling problems caused_by poverty is battling with_an_antagonistic force |Aliases= |Source schema=پیکار با نیرویی متخاصم |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=اما دولت برای مقابله با گرانی پسته با تصمیمی شتاب‌زده مانع از صادرات 200 هزار تن پسته شد تا قیمت را کاهش دهد در صورتی که می توانست با تدبیری درست قیمت پسته را کاهش دهد نه مانع از صادرات آن شود. }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Controlling problems caused_by poverty is battling with_an_antagonistic force |Aliases= |Source schema=پیکار با نیرویی متخاصم |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=رئيس كميسيون اقتصادي مجلس شوراي اسلامي گفت: ما در اجرا و سياستگذاري براي مبارزه با تورم هيچگاه به عمق و ريشه‌هاي آن نپرداخته‌ايم چرا كه مبارزه با تورم امروزه در دنيا از فرمول‌هاي علمي اقتصادي تبعيت مي‌كند.‌ |Example.Gloss=President commission economic Majlis council Islamic stated: we in the execution and policy making in order to fight with inflation never with depth and roots devote for the fight with inflation today in the world from formulas scientific economic adhere they |Example.English translation= The president of the economic commission of Majlis [the Iranian parliament] stated: we have never examined the root causes of inflation while executing and making policies that fight it because today's world adheres to scientific and economic formulas in its fight against inflation
|Example.Provenance=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=8806011605 }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}

{{Metaphor |Name gloss=Controlling problems caused_by poverty is battling with_an_antagonistic force |Aliases= |Comments=ADDRESSING SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS WAGING WAR is close but does not quite correspond with this schema. |Source schema=پیکار با نیرویی متخاصم |Target schema=فقر |Mappings= |Related metaphors= |Entailments= |Examples={{Example |Example.Language=Persian |Example.Text=رئيس كميسيون اقتصادي مجلس شوراي اسلامي گفت: ما در اجرا و سياستگذاري براي مبارزه با تورم هيچگاه به عمق و ريشه‌هاي آن نپرداخته‌ايم چرا كه مبارزه با تورم امروزه در دنيا از فرمول‌هاي علمي اقتصادي تبعيت مي‌كند.‌ |Example.Gloss=President commission economic Majlis council Islamic stated: we in the execution and policy making in order to fight with inflation never with depth and roots devote for the fight with inflation today in the world from formulas scientific economic adhere they |Example.English translation=The president of the economic commission of Majlis [the Iranian parliament] stated: we have never examined the root causes of inflation while executing and making policies that fight it because today's world adheres to scientific and economic formulas in its fight against inflation |Example.Provenance=http://www.farsnews.com/newstext.php?nn=8806011605 }} |Entered by=Sanam, Aria |Last reviewed by=Aria Fani |Status=in development |Investigated for=Persian }}
